thread.title: Ground News - Death of 15yo boy in shark attack leaves SA surfing community 'devastated'
thread.title_full: Ground News - Death of 15yo boy in shark attack leaves SA surfing community 'devastated'

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Death of 15yo boy in shark attack leaves SA surfing community 'devastated'
text:
Summary by Ground News A 15-year-old boy from Maslin Beach died in the attack near Ethel Beach. Surfing South Australia said its "utmost sympathies" were with the boy's family. Police responded to reports a person had been "seriously injured" around 1:30pm. The body of a teenage boy was recovered from the water. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
ABC Australia Lean Left High Factuality Government: Australian Government Death of 15yo boy in shark attack leaves SA surfing community 'devastated' A 15-year-old boy killed by a shark at a popular tourism and surfing location on South Australia's Yorke Peninsula is being remembered as a "talented and dearly loved" young surfer.
